end

always @(posedge s_axi_aclk) begin
  if (s_axi_aresetn == 1'b0) begin
    up_irq_source <= 2'b00;
  end else begin
    up_irq_source <= up_irq_trigger | (up_irq_source & ~up_irq_source_clear);
  end
end
